name: Killing Time (itch) (DennisMagnusson)
description:
This game was made for the Indie Tales Jam 2021. The theme for the jam was "One Room". The full game, including all of the assets, were made in less than 48 hours.

In this game, you are stuck in a jail cell for 30 years. When you're stuck for 30 years, there's only one thing you can do: kill time.

How to Play:

Move your character with WASD and change orientation with IJKL. When the walls turn blue, press SPACE to unleash a special attack.

How to Run:

If you have Java installed, you can simply download and run the .jar file. Otherwise, you can download the platform-specific version. Simply unzip it and run the executable file inside.
